nodes.name: Drop Columns
nodes.description: This node creates a new DataFrame by dropping the specified columns
nodes.details:
This node creates a new DataFrame by deleting columns specified as an input.

The specified columns are dropped from the incoming DataFrame to generate the output DataFrame.
nodes.examples:
If incoming Dataframe has following columns

  • CUST_CD
  • CUST_NAME
  • DOB
  • ADDRESS
and [DOB] and [ADDRESS] need to be dropped from outgoing Dataframe then add following to the Drop list in the Drop Column node:

  • DOB
  • ADDRESS

fields.name: comment
fields.value:
Multivariate Time Series Forecasting using VAR.


  • Read the data using CSV node & drop the unwanted columns.
  • Pass the data with only required fields to the VAR node. The summary of the VAR model is displayed on the result page.
  • Use VarForeact:
  • validation is true, pass the validation dataframe. RMSE metrics will be displayed on the result page.
  • validation is false, select the steps for the forecast.
fields.title: Comment
fields.description: Comments for the Workflow
